name: Octane Remix Mobile
description:
April Fools (and 1 year anniversary) mobile version of Octane Remix (https://teamvelocita.itch.io/octane-remix)

Controls

Mouse or touch screen:

click on ground to steer car towards finger, throttle amount depends on distance between the car and the cursor.

Other actions are performed through UI buttons.

Keyboard:

W to accelerate, S to reverse.
A/D to steer.
R to reset.
E to fire antilag.
Space to handbrake slide.

Gamepad:

Left stick X axis to steer.
Right trigger to accelerate.
Left trigger to reverse.
Select to reset.
A/X (or "south button") to fire antilag.
B/O (or "east button") to handbrake slide
